verbose_text: Molecular characterization of this event has shown that the SipB and SopE SPI1 effectors stimulate the formation of inflammasomes, multicellular complexes containing caspase-1, and the NOD-LRR family of proteins.
evidence: SipB and SopE SPI1 effectors stimulate the formation of inflammasomes, multicellular complexes containing caspase-1, and the NOD-LRR family
